meanings.definition: The act of framing or enclosing something within a frame.
meanings.sent1: The enframement of the painting highlighted its beauty.
meanings.sent2: The enframement of the photograph enhanced its presentation.
meanings.sent3: The enframement of the picture made it look like a masterpiece.
meanings.sent4: Her enframement of the artwork turned it into a work of art itself.
meanings.sent5: The enframement of the mirror reflected elegance in the room.

meanings.definition: The state of being framed or enclosed within a frame.
meanings.sent1: The enframement of the certificate gave it a professional touch.
meanings.sent2: The enframement of the diploma preserved its significance.
meanings.sent3: The enframement of the award made it stand out on the wall.
meanings.sent4: His enframement within the family photo brought a smile to his face.
meanings.sent5: The enframement of the map added a decorative element to the room.
